--------------------
<Text: The Heroes' Acre (Afrikaans: "Die Heldeakker" ; Dutch: "De Heldenakker" ) is a section of Church Street Cemetery in Pretoria, South Africa.>
Triplets:<The Heroes' Acre
1:
--------------------
<Text: Heroes' Acre, Pretoria:  It was established in 1867, and contains the graves of renowned citizens and public figures.>
Triplets:<Heroes' Acre
2:
--------------------
Text: Heroes' Acre, Pretoria:  It is the burial place of a number of historical figures including Andries Pretorius, Paul Kruger and Hendrik Verwoerd.
Triplets:<Heroes' Acre
3:
--------------------
Text: Heroes' Acre, Pretoria:  Australian Boer War anti-hero Breaker Morant (executed by the British for war crimes during the Second Anglo-Boer War) is also buried here.
Triplets:<Heroes' Acre
